attributes.action: Stop the RBS Director Pay Deal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like the Taxpayer to refuse to pay the Directors of RBS the very Immoral and Inflated Wage.

We also want all pay of Directors of Public owned bodies to be capped at the same rate as an MP.

NO Bonuses or Expenses other than travel costs.
